title: How can I get my (in warranty) Pixel 3A replaced if its camera is dead? I tried all the fixes.
content:
My main phone camera in the Pixel 3A is dead. I bought this device at Saturn in Treptow, Berlin DE.

I would like to exercise my right for the warranty and have the phone replaced with a working one.

I already tried all the possible fixes and the camera does not work.

I know under COVID there are extraordinary circumstances but I cannot let the warranty expire just because of this, I could not find any suitable alternative to have the phone replaced as it would normally happen.

Thanks.
